title: Portket
data:
{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"huge"},"insert":"About Portket"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Portket is a web application designed to provide a platform for users to share and discover creative content. Whether you're an artist, photographer, designer, or any other type of creative individual, Portket aims to connect you with a community of like-minded people and showcase your work to the world."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Screenshots"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Portket/portket_2.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Portket/portket_1.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"header":2},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Portket/portket_3.png"}},{"attributes":{"header":2},"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Features"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"User Authentication: Users can create accounts, log in, and log out securely."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Social Authentication: Users can log in using their Facebook or Google accounts."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Content Sharing: Users can upload and share their creative content, including images and other media files."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Content Discovery: Users can explore and discover creative content shared by other users."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Interactive Experience: The application provides an interactive and engaging user experience, with features such as likes, comments, and more."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Google Authentication: Users can log in using their Google accounts for streamlined access and security."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Responsive Design: Portket is designed to be responsive and accessible across various devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Technologies"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Backend: Express.js, Sequelize (with MySQL database), Passport.js for authentication, dotenv for environment variables"},{"attributes":{"list":"ordered"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Handlebars.js for template"},{"attributes":{"list":"ordered"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Image Processing: Sharp.js for image processing"},{"attributes":{"list":"ordered"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"API Integration: Imgur API for image uploading"},{"attributes":{"list":"ordered"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Development Tools: Nodemon for automatic server restart, ESLint for code linting, Prettier for code formatting, Webpack for bundling assets"},{"attributes":{"list":"ordered"},"insert":"
"}]}
description: Portket is a website where users can share and discover creative content. With an intuitive interface, it allows for easy uploading and exploration of diverse projects, fostering a vibrant community of creators and viewers.

title: Blender Projects
data:
{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"Red Door"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"The apartment's facade was unsettling. A vivid red metal door stood out against the worn concrete walls, covered in yellow charms inscribed with intricate characters, as if sealing something sinister inside. The surrounding walls were plastered with posters and graffiti, angrily accusing "LIAR" and pleading "PAY BACK MONEY," creating a chaotic and desperate atmosphere."},{"insert":"

"},{"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Blender/red_gate.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"Control Room"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"A Japanese-style control room with a hallway lined with a few hazard barrels, bathed in an eerie green light to create a more unsettling feeling."},{"insert":"

"},{"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Blender/corridor.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"Game Boy"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Its a Game Boy"},{"insert":"

"},{"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Blender/gameboy.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"Bookstand"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"A small cartoon-style bookstand that has just been crashed, with books scattered around and the structure slightly tilted, adding a touch of chaos to the scene."},{"insert":"

"},{"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Blender/bookstore.png"}},{"insert":"

"}]}
description: Some environment and model created in Blender

title: BOTs
data:
{"ops":[{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffd500","background":"transparent","size":"huge","bold":true},"insert":"About BOTs"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Project Partner: "},{"attributes":{"underline":true,"color":"#ffd500","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"Peter Richmond"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":", who is credited for half of the project's creations."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"BOTs is a third person "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"RPG shooter"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":", focusing on crazy weapons and power up abilities.The world of BOTs is about robots fighting each other in the arenas for fame, "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"money"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" and "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"power"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"! Join the fight, kill some bots, get loots and be awesome! and obey the Mayor."},{"insert":"

"},{"insert":{"customVideo":"//www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/XCPqFez5mQU?autoplay=1&mute=1&loop=1&playlist=XCPqFez5mQU"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"huge","bold":true},"insert":"DaBotCity"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"DaBotCity"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" is a city located in a robot planet, which is a giant market place for bots to buy "},{"attributes":{"color":"#66a3e0","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"Gears"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":", "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ed1566","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"Weapons"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":", "},{"attributes":{"color":"#e60000","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"Upgrades"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" and connect them too all the arenas. Center of the city always display the "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"King of the Arena"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" for all to known its awesomeness!"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/env/env_12.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/others/others_26.webp"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ff0099","size":"huge","bold":true},"insert":"The Mayor"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Mayor is the source of "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff0099","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Greed"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" and "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff0099","background":"transparent"},"insert":"evil"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":", who is the one and only government of DaBotCity, which use the Area to gain personal fame and fortune."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"​"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"There is a "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff0099","background":"transparent"},"insert":"mini-Bot"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" inside the Mayor's hat, which some believe its the actual Mayor, and is controling the body of the bigger Mayor."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/gif/mayorlaugh.gif"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"


"},{"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/others/others_7.webp"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffd500","size":"huge","bold":true},"insert":"Characters"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"The design of the character is "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffd500","background":"transparent"},"insert":"simple"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":", iconic and easy to customize with gears. The plan was to have a core model bot, and just add items and gears on it to make them unique."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent"},"insert":" "},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"The design of gears is open for all style, fantacy, sci-fi and parody of other popular games."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/others/others_6.webp"}},{"insert":"


"},{"attributes":{"color":"#00c3ff","size":"huge","bold":true},"insert":"Class"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"The design is heavily influenced by World of Warcraft's class system, where in each team there will be "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffd500","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"Tank"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":", "},{"attributes":{"color":"#3d9be9","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"DPS"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":", "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff0099","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"Healer"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":", and "},{"attributes":{"color":"#00ffb3","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"Support"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":". Player can become "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"ANY ROLE"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" by gearing the releted gears, which allow infinite amount of different play style and character customization."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"PACIFIST"},{"attributes":{"size":"large","color":"#a0a09f","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":" "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffd500","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"TANK"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"The soul and body of the group, even when robot doesn't have soul, tank's job is to lead the group from battle to battle, and as any good leader in business, he needs to be a visionary, always plan ahead, and time to time "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffd500","background":"transparent"},"insert":"take a bullet for the team"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" (or a rocket)."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_4.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"DA SNIPER"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" "},{"attributes":{"color":"#00c3ff","bold":true},"insert":"DPS"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Shooting from afar, getting most of the kills and golds, a DAMAGE bot is the weapon of the team, who's only goal is to "},{"attributes":{"color":"#3d9be9","background":"transparent"},"insert":"hurt the enemy, as hard as you can! "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Sitting in the back of the team also means you die less, and its great for those nubs who just want sit back and right click on anything that move."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_2.webp"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"SHABOT"},{"attributes":{"color":"#a0a09f","background":"transparent"},"insert":" "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff006f","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"HEALER"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Smoking isn't actually cool, but a Healer sure is, the Healer factor a healer can bring to the team is crucial to the survival of the team. Like the "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff006f","background":"transparent"},"insert":"head of the Zombie"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":", he you don't kill the Healer, you will never bring the team down, and there for healer is always being hunted by everyone in battle. If you enjoy playing Doctor when you are 10, Healer is the role for you!"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_3.png"}},{"insert":"


"},{"attributes":{"color":"#34feb3","background":"transparent","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"You are what your wear"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"In BOTs you can "},{"attributes":{"color":"#00ffb3","background":"transparent"},"insert":"gear up to look and play the way you want"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":", and your Role is going to be determine by your what you are using. This maximum the amount of play style and look player can have, it your game, play the way you want !"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/gif/shop2.gif"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#fb1a6f","size":"huge","bold":true},"insert":"City Location"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff006f","background":"transparent","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Weapon District"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"The Weapon District is one of the five districts in DaBotCity, housing an extensive array of weapons and gear. Additionally, it hosts some of the city's most exotic entertainment, featuring an XXX strip club, bars, a mini-arena, and the Mayor's Gift Shop"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/env/env_4.jpg"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/env/env_10.jpg"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/env/env_11.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ff006f","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"One-on-One Arena"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Arena: Built within the city itself, this arena allows all bots to engage in thrilling one-on-one battles to the death. The winner claims all the loops and gears dropped by their opponent, of course."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/env/env_9.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"size":"large","background":"transparent","color":"#ff006f","bold":true},"insert":"Tunnel of Death"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"The Tunnel of Death connects the arena to the shopping center of the city. It's a forbidden zone, and Bot Cops will shoot on sight. However, looters and merchants often travel here to loot and sell weapons to arena fighters."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/env/env_8.jpg"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff006f","background":"transparent","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Roggg's Lair"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"At Roggg's Lair, all bots can unite for a thrilling PVE experience, battling a colossal, abandoned killing machine."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/env/env_7.jpg"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ff006f","background":"transparent","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Underwater Park"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"At the lower level of the city lies an underwater shopping center. However, it also doubles as a free-for-all arena, where you can handle both your shopping and combat in one visit !"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/env/env_5.png"}},{"insert":"


"},{"attributes":{"size":"huge","color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"Sketches"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_10.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_11.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_12.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_13.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_14.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_15.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_16.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_17.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_18.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_6.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_7.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_8.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_9.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/characters/characters_5.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/others/others_16.png"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#d4d4d4"},"insert":"Arena express : For all yours killing needs! "},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"height":"117.89%","width":"31.11%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/Bots/gif/ani_flower.gif"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"

"}]}
description: During university, two people created a project using UDK, Maya, Photoshop, and CrazyBump. It's a third-person shooter RPG in a robot world. Do you want to become the king of the arena? Then you have to kill, kill, kill your way to the top!

title: Old Projects
data:
{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#3d9be9","background":"transparent","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"PROJECT ZEUS"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"On the brink of Extinction, human scientists finally discovered a new form of "},{"attributes":{"color":"#3d9be9","background":"transparent"},"insert":"energy source"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" from a distant planet. A black liquid-like organism, extracted from the planet's inner core, which is said to be able to maintain human life. Human soon starts construction of labs and workstations on the planet, it was then named "},{"attributes":{"color":"#3d9be9","background":"transparent"},"insert":"planet Zeus"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Before human can extract energy from Zeus, the headquarter on Zeus lost connection with Earth. Three months later, a scouting ship arrived at Zeus, they found nothing, nothing besides a sentence written with blood that said: "},{"attributes":{"color":"#3d9be9","background":"transparent"},"insert":""It has been expecting us.""},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/zeus/images_1.gif"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Project Zeus is a science horror survival game, set in a mining planet name Zeus. The player is on a mission to "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#3d9be9"},"insert":"find survivor "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"on the planet and discover what happened."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"In Project Zeus, your enemy is also your weapon and life. The Black-creature is a slim like organism that will try to absorb any life near it, however, when contained, it is also the "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#3d9be9"},"insert":"energy source"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" that power your weapon and armor."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/zeus/images_19.jpg"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/zeus/images_21.jpg"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#fcbf3a","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"LAND OF CAN'T TELL WHERE"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"The story follows a traveler that had lost in a strange fog and now finds himself in a strange island. He will have to discover where he is and how to get out of this place before something even more strange happened."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/others/images_18.jpg"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#fcbf3a","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Puzzel : Door"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Player’s boat was caught up some strange fog and now he is on this island. In front of him is an ancient ruin with a giant stone door that’s blocking the entrance. There is some kind of a puzzle on the stone door, with some strange writing on it. withPlayer will have to solve the puzzle in order to open the door."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"​"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"Player has to solve the stone door puzzle. The goal is to move the sinning stone on the top right to the bottom, where there is a space with the same symbol on it."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"height":"99.49%","width":"50.90%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/others/images_35.png"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#fcbf3a","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Puzzel : Ruin"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"When the player gets in to the ruin he soon realizes that the exit to the upper floor is block by some stones. When he was searching for another way to get up to that strange tree he find a diary next to a dead body. It tells how the author got on this island, and for some reason had been locks in side this ruin by someone."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Suddenly there are some noises at the entrance, when the player turns he see two dark figures closing the door behind him. Now the player has to find a way out of this place. Player soon realizes there is some light coming form below the dead body. It seems to be another room below this, and it maybe the only way out of this place."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"height":"91.82%","width":"56.12%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/others/images_31.png"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Player will find a strange light coming from below the dead body, and soon realize there is a secret entrance. Once enter the entrance player find himself in a dark dungeon, and luckily there is some sinning mushroom, so he picks one up and start to find an exit. Player’s mushroom will soon run out of light, and there are mushrooms all over this level. Player has to have another one before he gets into total darkness."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"height":"98.47%","width":"31.15%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/others/images_34.png"}},{"attributes":{"height":"98.47%","width":"31.74%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/old_concept/others/images_33.png"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#f22727","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"UTOPIA"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Utopia is a concept video for a "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ff0000"},"insert":"survival"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" game, set in a world where the red army is in charge of the nation. As a citizen of the Red, you have "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#f22727"},"insert":"to escape "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"the country while surviving the "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#f22727"},"insert":"cold"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":", "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#f22727"},"insert":"hunger"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":", and the "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#f22727"},"insert":"army"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"."},{"insert":"

"},{"insert":{"customVideo":"//www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/HZgMgN_t5Js?autoplay=1&mute=1&loop=1&playlist=HZgMgN_t5Js"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffea2e","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Old Animation"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"Can You Run?"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"A Short animation created in "},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffea2e"},"insert":"Maya"},{"attributes":{"background":"transparent","color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"."},{"insert":"

"},{"insert":{"customVideo":"//www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/L6S4n42SgQU?autoplay=1&mute=1&loop=1&playlist=L6S4n42SgQU"}},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","bold":true},"insert":"Idle / Walk / Taunt"},{"insert":"

description: During university, projects included 2D illustrations, 3D models, scene design, animation, and more. The portfolio highlights versatility across various artistic disciplines.

title: Essence of Darkness
data:
{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#f24a4a","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Unity Demo"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"I have started integrating some assets into Unity and am currently testing the environment by navigating through it. As a beginner in coding, this process might take a while, but I am hopeful to eventually complete it."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"This recording is a test to gauge the world's atmosphere. Please note that nothing in this video is finalized; everything is just a placeholder for now."},{"insert":"
"},{"insert":{"customVideo":"//www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/MZYVe1svbfc?autoplay=1&mute=1&loop=1&playlist=MZYVe1svbfc"}},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#f24a4a","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Plot"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"A small creature waking up the first time in its life after creation, and it found itself to be in an underground city ruin, which has been taken over by some dark forces, and has been taking over lives of all living things in the city."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" "},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"The small creature is now out for food and supply in order to "},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"#444444"},"insert":"survive another day, and discover a way out"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":" of this ruin place. Exploring the city, crafting for gears and tool, the creature will need to keep moving, and scavenge every corner of the city to make it to the days to come."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/EOD/env/env_11.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#f24a4a","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"Environment"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"The Lab"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"The room of the great magician, and the beginning point of your journey."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/EOD/env/env_8.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"The Sewer"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"sewer that connect the whole underground city, many gate ways that make sure any visitor will be lost within."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/EOD/env/env_25.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent","bold":true},"insert":"The Market"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"From weapons, masks, potions to foods and drinks, you can get anything here."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/EOD/env/env_26.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#f24a4a","size":"large","bold":true},"insert":"UI / State"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"A wheel will show when player touch the player, which content the following buttons:"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"1. Backpack"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"2. Hero's Journey (book/map)"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"3. States"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"4. Emotion/Needs"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","background":"transparent"},"insert":"5. Toggle Mode (Combat/ Scavenge/ Sneak)"},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"height":"101.02%","width":"76.16%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/EOD/env/env_12.png"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"height":"124.54%","width":"80.14%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/EOD/ui/ui_4.png"}},{"attributes":{"align":"center"},"insert":"

description: Essence of Darkness is a 2D dark fantasy survival game, where player control a mini creature alone in a dark underground city

title: Charlulu's Shop
data:
{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"huge"},"insert":"Frontend"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Charlulu Shop Frontend is the front-end service for the Charlulu Shop. It provides a user interface for buyers to interact with the e-commerce features of the Charlulu Shop website."},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#fdf517"},"insert":"⚠️ Important Note: Please be aware that this project does not handle payment transactions. It is designed solely for order management and email notifications to both buyers and sellers."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Charlulu/charlulu_react_1.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Charlulu/charlulu_react_2.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Features"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"User Authentication: Secure login and registration."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Product Browsing: Browse available products with images, descriptions, prices, and stock information."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Shopping Cart: Add, remove, and manage items in the shopping cart."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Order Placement: Place orders for selected items with quantity selection and payment options."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Order Tracking: View and track order status and history."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"React Hash Router: Utilize React Hash Router to simulate URL changes for enhanced user experience."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"YouTube Integration: Display the newest YouTube video from the seller's channel. The backend server fetches data from the YouTube API to provide the latest video."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Responsive Design: Optimized for various screen sizes, including mobile and desktop devices."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Technologies"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"React: Frontend library for building user interfaces."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"React Router: Routing library for navigating between pages."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"SweetAlert2: Library for customizable alerts and modals."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Vite: Next-generation frontend tooling for development and build processes."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"huge"},"insert":"Backend"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Charlulu Shop Backend is the backend server for the Charlulu Shop React site. It provides the necessary functionality and endpoints to support features of the Charlulu Shop react website."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Charlulu/charlulu_backend_1.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"width":"100%"},"insert":{"customImage":"https://klu0926-public.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/portfolio/website/Charlulu/charlulu_backend_2.png"}},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Features"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Authentication: Secure login/logout."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Authorization: Access control for endpoints."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Data Storage: Store product/user info, orders."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"CRUD Items: Manage items with attributes like image, name, description, price, and stock."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"CRUD Tags: Associate tags with each item."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"CRUD Orders: Manage buyer orders, including creation, viewing, updating, and deletion."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"YouTube Integration: Display the newest YouTube video from the seller's channel. Provides hourly updates and sends video data to the React site."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Email Notifications: Nodemailer for order alerts, see "},{"attributes":{"color":"#fb4646","link":"https://github.com/klu0926/charlulushop-backend?tab=readme-ov-file"},"insert":"example"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":" <-"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff","size":"large"},"insert":"Technologies"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Backend Framework: Express.js"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Handlebars.js for template"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Database ORM: Sequelize (with MySQL database)"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Environment Variables: dotenv"},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Image Handling: Sharp for optimized resizing, Multer for media uploads."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"YouTube Integration: Google API for fetching latest shop video."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Email Service: Nodemailer for order alerts."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#ffffff"},"insert":"Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS): Core for frontend-backend integration."},{"attributes":{"list":"bullet"},"insert":"
"},{"insert":"
"}]}
description: Charlulu's Shop is a website for selling second-hand items. Buyers can easily browse and order items, receiving email notifications upon checkout. Sellers use a backend dashboard to track orders and their statuses.
